thread.title: Arsenal THIRD choice keeper Emiliano Martinez may face Lincoln as Arsene Wenger waits on David Ospina injury
thread.title_full: Arsenal THIRD choice keeper Emiliano Martinez may face Lincoln as Arsene Wenger waits on David Ospina injury

author: John Cross
title: Arsenal THIRD choice keeper Emiliano Martinez may face Lincoln as Arsene Wenger waits on David Ospina injury
text:
Sport Arsenal THIRD choice keeper Emiliano Martinez may face Lincoln as Arsene Wenger waits on David Ospina injury Ankle problem may prevent Colombian who has played all this season's FA Cup and European games facing giant-killers Share Martinez looked the part at Friday training, but hasn't played a senior game since November (Photo: Arsenal/Getty) Share Get Arsenal FC   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Arsene Wenger is facing another keeper dilemma for Arsenal's FA Cup quarter-final against non-League Lincoln, with an injury doubt over David Ospina. 
Boss Wenger has drafted the Gunners ' inexperienced third-choice Emiliano Martinez, whose only appearances this season have been in the EFL Cup, into the squad for Saturday's game at the Emirates. 
But he could turn to Premier League first-choice Petr Cech as he is set to go with a strong line-up against the Imps, who have beaten four league sides including top-flight Burnley to become the first non-League club to reach the last eight since 1913. If Ospina cannot play, Wenger must gamble on Martinez or recall No1 Petr Cech (Photo: Bongarts/Getty) Read More Lincoln deploy secret weapon in bid to down Arsenal â€” rugby legend Clive Woodward 
Mirror Sport revealed this week that Cech is increasingly frustrated at not playing in Champions League matches. 
Ospina has been nursing a niggle since the Bayern Munich game on Tuesday night, and Cech would be keen to play if the Colombian is out. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
